constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 68 (Tuesday, April 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. McBATH:
H.R. 2700.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8: Congress has the power ``to regulate
commerce with foreign nations, and among the several states,
and with the Native American tribes''
[Page H1999]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: For-Profit College Conversion Accountability Act
